title: Them's Fightin' Herds (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Are you ready to fight? Claim Them's Fightin' Herds for free via Epic Games Store! Them’s Fightin’ Herds is a 2D fighting game featuring a cast of adorable cartoon animals.

2. Click the "GET" button to add the game to your library.
